pages.text: $(thing)Smart Filters/$ can be inserted into a $(l:intro/modules)module's/$ filter slots in place of regular items.  Instead of just trying to match against the item directly, filters have special matching functionality.$(p)For example, the $(l:filters/bulk_item)Bulk Item Filter/$ can efficiently match against up to 54 different items, and its items can be configured from an existing inventory.
$(italic)Bulk Item Filter installed in a Puller Mk2 Module/$
